text: 10.25: Ro 13.11; Fi 4.5; Hi 3.13; 2 Pi 3.9-11; 3.14Nza guigira Fhe Bakɨme khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, nza gumgi mbari mbui tɨvar muuŋv, nza wari tɨgɨp phogir vhov, Fhe Bakɨme rotu mbui tɨva thamtha thari. Nza kaŋgi, Krais taagi zirɨrga tuk han mbarigi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nza bevbevira, nza khaŋ tɨgɨ havhargip, nza wari ndavi havharɨrga.
